promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic rare ostrich electric-type pokemon wearing a golden crystal headband. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or ostrich. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltstruze, a a gigantic rare ostrich electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Tapu Thunder-GX, Energy Wheel. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ostrich", "electric" or "Voltstruze". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, ostrich-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This colossal avian dwells in urban jungles, using its Tapu Thunder-GX to harness the city's energy into powerful charges. With its Energy Wheel, it deftly navigates bustling streets, becoming a living lightning marvel.
